SmartFieldSpec.Name: Earliest Sponsorship Date Smart Field
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Earliest child sponsorship date of all financial sponsorships for a constituent. Includes former sponsorships as well.
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Earliest Child Sponsorship Date smart field
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_EARLIESTCHILDSPONSORSHIPDATEFORCONSTITUENT ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date
select distinct c.ID, min(s.STARTDATE) from dbo.CONSTITUENT c join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on ft.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.REVENUESPLITID = rsplit.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID
group by c.ID
